amendment.description: Amendment ensures that the Technology Innovation Program will focus on high-reward technologies in areas of critical national need; provides additional guidance that the program must coordinate with similar State organizations and programs; and includes a definition of high-risk, high-reward research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-118 to make a number of clarifications to the Technology Innovation Program, i ncluding (1) that projects should address critical national needs and be high reward; (2) that TIP should coordinate with State innovation and technology development programs; and (3) a definition of high-risk, high-reward research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wu amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
